players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Diana's death is tragic. We must analyze who benefits. Bob, Alice, any thoughts?"
You: "I'm shocked about Diana. Charlie, you're quick to start questioning others - that seems defensive to me. We should all share our thoughts first."
Bob: "I investigated Alice last night and she is mafia. We must vote her out today."
You: "Bob, that's a convenient claim when you're under pressure. If you were really the detective, why didn't you speak first? Charlie asked for thoughts and you waited."
Bob: "I am the detective. I investigated Alice and she is mafia. Charlie, vote with me to eliminate her."

Charlie: "Bob, if you're the detective, why did you wait to reveal until after Alice questioned you? That timing seems suspicious. Alice, why are you deflecting instead of defending yourself directly?"

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Diana's death is tragic. We must analyze who benefits. Bob, Alice, any thoughts?"
Alice: "I'm shocked about Diana. Charlie, you're quick to start questioning others - that seems defensive to me. We should all share our thoughts first."
You: "I investigated Alice last night and she is mafia. We must vote her out today."
Alice: "Bob, that's a convenient claim when you're under pressure. If you were really the detective, why didn't you speak first? Charlie asked for thoughts and you waited."
You: "I am the detective. I investigated Alice and she is mafia. Charlie, vote with me to eliminate her."

Charlie: "Bob, if you're the detective, why did you wait to reveal until after Alice questioned you? That timing seems suspicious. Alice, why are you deflecting instead of defending yourself directly?"
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
